de.systemagmbh.interfaces.message
Interface ISysVariableValue

All Known Implementing Classes:
DummyISysVariableValue
public interface ISysVariableValue

Messages or renderers supporting this interface are capable of variable values.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Torsten Knauft

Method Summary
 Map getVariableValues()
          Returns a map with the current values for a list of variables.
 void setVariableValues(Map variableValues)
          Sets the current values for a list of variables.
 

Method Detail

setVariableValues

public void setVariableValues(Map variableValues)
Sets the current values for a list of variables. The variable names are the map keys, the current values are the correspondent map values.

Parameters:
variableValues - a map containing all variables and their current values

getVariableValues

public Map getVariableValues()
Returns a map with the current values for a list of variables. The variable names are the map keys, the current values are the correspondent map values.

Returns:
a map containing all variables and their current values
